entries.message:
Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Silicon Valley location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2025-09-02 04:15:00 UTC
End Time: 2025-09-02 08:15:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, Silicon Valley instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the New Jersey location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2025-07-31 04:05:00 UTC
End Time: 2025-07-31 06:05:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, New Jersey instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.
